original_text: Joshua did what the Lord had commanded him to do. He cut their horses' legs and he burned their chariots.
korean_text: 여호수아가 여호와께서 자기에게 명령하신 대로 행하여 그들의 말 뒷발의 힘줄을 끊고 그들의 병거를 불로 살랐더라

sentences.original_text: Joshua did what the Lord had commanded him to do
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아는 주께서 자신에게 명령하신 것을 행했다
